title: Running Our Own RPG Tavern: The Prancing Pony - Tavern Tycoon: Dragon's Hangover Gameplay
description:
Hey guys! Welcome to Tavern Tycoon - Dragon's Hangover.  This is a strategy game where you build your very own RPG tavern.  It is in early access, and I really enjoy it. We are going to build the Prancing Pony and have the best tavern in town :D Enjoy! 


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
